vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Marriage.sendMessage (0x958a8f594101d2c0485a52319f29b2647f2ebc06.sol#104-114) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (0x958a8f594101d2c0485a52319f29b2647f2ebc06.sol#110)

vulnerability_findings.name: deprecated-standards
vulnerability_findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ 0x958a8f594101d2c0485a52319f29b2647f2ebc06.sol#58:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
